channel.title: London Campuses on Ontario Universities & Colleges Coalition
channel.description: Recent content in London Campuses on Ontario Universities & Colleges Coalition

item.title: Protest at MPP Jeff Yurek's office: March 8 @ 11:30am
item.description: You are invited to a protest with the London Student Coalition and labour allies this Friday at the office of Elgin-Middlesex-London PC MPP Jeff Yurek. Buses from Fanshawe and Western and onsite pizza will be provided by OPSEU from the Fight Ford Fund. Friday, March 8 11:30am 750 Talbot Street, St. Thomas Facebook event information Catch the Bus From Western University The free bus to the rally leaves from: Middlesex College circle 11am Catch the Bus from Fanshawe The free bus to the rally leaves from:
